text: Thomas Freienstein (born 9 March 1960) is a German former cyclist. He won the Hessen-Rundfahrt in 1982 and 1984. He competed in the individual road race and the team time trial events at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:German male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of West Germany Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Fulda
title: Thomas Freienstein
